replies.body:
While we're not able to modify your LP after the server has recorded the loss, I can assist you in finding a solution for your bugsplats. These types of errors are often caused by unstable drivers or windows settings that conflict with League. A good starting step is to take a look at the steps in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as they commonly resolve this issue.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.
